channel.title: Project Lord of The Rings
channel.description:
So I'm wanting to develop something new, as opposed to all the same old servers competing against each other. The idea is that I make this server and client (Project LOTR) with massive game changes. When I looked up the idea all I found was this https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=620959.0 people basically just dissed his idea and it doesn't look like he made it.
First off. Classes Accounts starting off will be required to choose a class. Hunter, Lore-master, or Champion. Each class has its own starter pack and can spawn from unique locations from each other. I hopefully will add some class-specific items, possible rings, titles, or maybe even more if I get more ideas. Each class spawns a different looking character as well so far. [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3979400/Screenshot_2014-04-02_11.36.18.png[/img]
Titles. Like in runescape, but a bit more on topic here. [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3979390/Screenshot_2014-04-02_11.28.10.png[/img]
Client. Of course all the cache to go with any custom work as well. [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3979399/Screenshot_2014-04-02_11.33.55.png[/img]
Might change text or login box yet, client gets a background at random. [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3979405/Screenshot_2014-04-02_11.30.55.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3979406/Screenshot_2014-04-02_11.31.15.png[/img]
Basically I want to change how the game works.
The class you choose from the beginning will help you in pvp. Lots of pvp titles and eventually rewards as well
I want to create bosses related to the books. Smaug, golem, gandalf, and more are all going to be npc's.
Now I know custom maps are a lot of work and from experience wont turn out well for me. Maybe this is something for the future but I doubt it.
There is lots of places and things I know I can use to make a pretty sweet game.
But I want the armor and weapons all to be unique to the server, so lots of weapon names are gonna change as well as their stats and requirements. I have been playing LOTRO as well thats also where some item names and properties can come from.
Ugh I should watch all the blu rays once I have the chance too I would be busy forever.

item.title: Project Lord of The Rings
item.dc:creator: @Nissan_Nut Nissan Nut
item.description:
@Nissan_Nut wrote:

Unique class-trainer npc’s. For the class, and for once the player achieves 99 in their specific class skill.

Getting some bree-land npc’s in.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Lord of The Rings
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

This looks like a Trisidia base.

Stahp before the idea catches aids.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Lord of The Rings
item.dc:creator: @Nissan_Nut Nissan Nut
item.description:
@Nissan_Nut wrote:

Yeah I’ve now got more of an idea for home. Changing the size of the player was not a good idea so that is out. Aslo might be odd but I found the best way to get popular weapons from the movie I’m going to grab a bunch of information from sites like Lord of the Rings Merchandise Shop - All Tolkien Jewelry, Swords and Products lol as odd as it is, its right to the point of items I’ll have in game.

I’m going to try to keep it a little less cheasy as possible throwing up some more custom items. Pvp will all have to learn by ear once the server is done, should be interesting.


I haven’t determined any stats yet but it will be complete.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Lord of The Rings
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

I like it, it’s an idea of thought of a while back but never got around to getting to it. Any who good luck to you.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Lord of The Rings
item.dc:creator: @Nissan_Nut Nissan Nut
item.description:
@Nissan_Nut wrote:

So I’m wanting to develop something new, as opposed to all the same old servers competing against each other. The idea is that I make this server and client (Project LOTR) with massive game changes. When I looked up the idea all I found was this https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=620959.0 people basically just dissed his idea and it doesn’t look like he made it.

First off. Classes
Accounts starting off will be required to choose a class. Hunter, Lore-master, or Champion. Each class has its own starter pack and can spawn from unique locations from each other. I hopefully will add some class-specific items, possible rings, titles, or maybe even more if I get more ideas. Each class spawns a different looking character as well so far.

Titles. Like in runescape, but a bit more on topic here.

Client. Of course all the cache to go with any custom work as well.

Might change text or login box yet, client gets a background at random.

Basically I want to change how the game works.

The class you choose from the beginning will help you in pvp.
Lots of pvp titles and eventually rewards as well

I want to create bosses related to the books. Smaug, golem, gandalf, and more are all going to be npc’s.

Now I know custom maps are a lot of work and from experience wont turn out well for me. Maybe this is something for the future but I doubt it.

There is lots of places and things I know I can use to make a pretty sweet game.

But I want the armor and weapons all to be unique to the server, so lots of weapon names are gonna change as well as their stats and requirements. I have been playing LOTRO as well thats also where some item names and properties can come from.

Ugh I should watch all the blu rays once I have the chance too I would be busy forever.
